quotes: Life is what you make it. Always has been, always will be.
Rudeness is the weak man's imitation of strength.
The only way to ?find out if it will work out' is to do it.
Do not allow your inner doubts to keep you from achieving what you can do.
Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
We learn by pushing ourselves and finding what really lies at the outer reaches of our abilities.
Money poisons you when you've got it, and starves you when you haven't.
To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
Take interest and even delight in doing the small things well.
The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
Be a good animal, true to your instincts.
Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
Make each day your masterpiece.
The golden opportunity you are seeking is in yourself. It is not in your environment; it is not in luck or chance, or the help of others; it is in yourself alone.
The law of harvest is to reap more than you sow. Sow an act, and you reap a habit. Sow a habit and you reap a character. Sow a character and you reap a destiny.
If you need inspiration, don't do it.
You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
Anything you may hold firmly in your imagination can be yours.
The greatest deception men suffer is from their own opinions.
Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.
Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
It is best to begin at the beginning.
Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.
Don't ever save anything for a special occasion. Being alive is the special occasion.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
You are not only responsible for what you say, but also for what you do not say.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Every adversity, every failure, every heartbreak, carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit.
As you think, so shall you become.
Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives, but what we do consistently.
No man is happy who does not think himself so.
Stop wasting time defending your problems and work on addressing them instead.
Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
Deliberately seek the company of people who influence you to think and act on building the life you desire.
If you want more luck, take more chances.
Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.
Make your mind your own business.
The universe doesn't give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.
Cease striving. Then there will be transformation.
Charms strike the sight, but merit wins the soul.
The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
The question is not what you look at, but what you see.
Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
